025    
026    package com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor.standard.form;
027    
028    import java.util.HashMap;
029    import java.util.Map;
030    
031    import org.apache.commons.fileupload.FileItem;
032    
033    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor.standard.StandardRequestData;
034    
035    import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
036    
037    public class FormPostRequestData extends StandardRequestData {
038      
039      public static final String ACTION_ELEMENT = "extAction";
040      public static final String METHOD_ELEMENT = "extMethod";
041      public static final String TID_ELEMENT = "extTID";
042      public static final String TYPE_ELEMENT = "extType";
043      public static final String UPLOAD_ELEMENT = "extUpload";
044      
045      // Make transient so that it is not serialized by our json processor
046      transient private boolean isUpload;
047      @NonNull transient private Map<String,String> formParameters;
048      @NonNull transient private Map<String, FileItem> fileFields; 
049      
050      public FormPostRequestData(String type, String action, String method, Long tid, boolean isUpload, Map<String, String> parameters, Map<String, FileItem> fileFields) {
051        super( type, action, method, tid);
052        
053        assert parameters != null;
054        assert !parameters.containsKey( ACTION_ELEMENT );
055        assert !parameters.containsKey( METHOD_ELEMENT );
056        assert !parameters.containsKey( TYPE_ELEMENT);
057        assert !parameters.containsKey( TID_ELEMENT );
058        assert !parameters.containsKey(UPLOAD_ELEMENT );
059    
060        Map<String,String> formParameters = new HashMap<String,String>(parameters);
061        this.formParameters = formParameters;
062        this.isUpload = isUpload;
063        this.fileFields = fileFields;
064      }
065    
066      public boolean isUpload() {
067        return this.isUpload;
068      }
069      
070      public Map<String,String> getFormParameters() {
071        return this.formParameters;
072      }
073      
074      public Map<String, FileItem> getFileFields() {
075        return this.fileFields;
076      }
077    }
